Data Fields
pwm_reqattr_t Struct Reference
Stratify OS » Device Interface » Pulse Width Modulation (PWM)

Structure to set the duty cycle of a channel. More...

#include <pwm.h>

Detailed Description

This structure is used to do a quick write of the PWM value and is used with I_PWM_SET.

Data Fields

u8 channel
 The channel.
 
pwm_duty_t duty
 The duty cycle.
